    filterByMonth()
    Method used for filtering appointments table by month Lambda expression #1: Used to set first condition for filtering appointments table by month, by ensuring beginning time of filtering range is after the current system time Lambda expression #2: Used to set second condition for filtering appointments table by month, by ensuring ending time of filtering range is one month after the current system time

    • filterByMonth

      public void filterByMonth() throws Exception
      Method used for filtering appointments table by month Lambda expression #1: Used to set first condition for filtering appointments table by month, by ensuring beginning time of filtering range is after the current system time Lambda expression #2: Used to set second condition for filtering appointments table by month, by ensuring ending time of filtering range is one month after the current system time
      Throws:
      Exception - For throwing Exception
